subject: Shrink CS_SYSTEMINFO
description:
Currently in sv_paks and sv_paknames (as part of CS_SYSTEMINFO) all pk3s/maps on the server are referenced which is not needed.

Idea:

- create a whitelist for custom pk3s (server cvar)
- only reference plain install pk3s, pk3s from the whitelist and the current map in sv_pak vars.

By only referencing the real required pk3s CS_SYSTEMINFO will no longer be cut when too many pk3s (maps) are on server and we have *all* benfits of a in total shorten CS. 

{TODO}
Find the cause why campaign mode doesn't only trigger map download for the current map. Other maps from campaign have to be downloaded for the first connect.
